---
title: Using a terminal
---

Many of the problems that I see originate in VSC!  The best way to make sure that everything is working is start with a command line terminal - a separate window OUTSIDE of VSC.  Then we'll get VSC working.

* Learn to work from a shell
* Learn to work without a mouse

This will help as you begin to create dev-ops actions and build docker containers.  Containers don't have GUI!

### Getting to your shell without a mouse

Press the *windows* key and starting typing the keyword *powershell* into the search bar. You only
need to enter the first few letters, then hit *enter*.  The menu will learn from your keystrokes
and eventually it will be the first option that shows up.

![](assets/getting-to-powershell.png)
